name: Dumbbell Bench Press
setup: Lie flat on a bench with feet planted on the floor
Hold a dumbbell in each hand, arms extended above chest, palms facing forward
steps: Lower dumbbells slowly to chest, elbows at ~45°
Pause briefly, then press back up to full extension
Keep wrists neutral and core braced
safety: Use a spotter if lifting heavy. Stop if shoulder pain occurs. Maintain neutral spine.

prescriptionHints.load: Start with 50-65% of normal working weight for deload

joints.notes: Keep elbows at 45°, avoid excessive arching.
